not precisely what -> she : 1
precisely what she -> said : 1
she said they -> of : 1
said they of -> us : 1
they of us -> is : 1
of us is -> a : 1
us is a -> recipient : 1
is a recipient -> of : 1
a recipient of -> the : 1
recipient of the -> maxwell : 1
of the maxwell -> award : 1
the maxwell award -> for : 1
maxwell award for -> fiction : 1
award for fiction -> writing : 1
for fiction writing -> given : 1
fiction writing given -> by : 1
writing given by -> the : 1
given by the -> dog : 1
by the dog -> writers : 1
association of she -> lives : 1
of she lives -> in : 1
lives in with -> her : 1
in with her -> two : 1
with her two -> and : 1
her two and -> two : 1
two and two -> alaskan : 1
and two alaskan -> her : 1
two alaskan her -> web : 1
